summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Jes Staley and Brent Morey, discussing the sharing of pictures. Jes Staley is identified as the CEO of JPMorgan Asset Management, and Brent Morey is noted as the Operations Manager at Brooklin Boat Yard. The email includes multiple attachments of pictures.

persons.name: Jes Staley

persons.name: Brent Morey

connections.description: Jes Staley, as CEO of JPMorgan Asset Management, is in a position of authority over Brent Morey, who is the Operations Manager at Brooklin Boat Yard.

locations: 270 Park Ave. 47th Floor, New York, NY 10017
keyFacts: The email was sent on August 5, 2008, at 7:11 PM.
Jes Staley is the CEO of JPMorgan Asset Management.
Brent Morey is the Operations Manager at Brooklin Boat Yard.
The email contains multiple attachments of pictures.
The correspondence indicates a casual sharing of images between the two individuals.
